author: henriettepetersen
body:
alidation

#### PR description:

The TkAlAllInOneTool has been migrated to condor and in addition the tool has been modified to accommodate the use of multi IOV validation @connorpa @adewit @DaveBrun94

#### PR validation:

Sufficient checks have been performed in routine alignment validation by the TkAl group since the changes have been used for quite some time.
title: multi-iov implementation and condor migration for tracker-alignment v
